title: Riot its time to make a choice
body: This is a critical point when every decision will matter. it is time to apologize and make amends to those who were affected by the Pax Event and really consider some things. You tried too hard to cover your "harassment" issues against women in the work place which now will backfire on you even harder. You seem to forget Men are a majority of your consumer base and calling them man babies was ill advised at best, downright idiotic at worst. I will not get into Ideologies or anything else like that, but I am interested to see how this situation will be handled by riot as they squirm to figure out what to do. Will I be quitting league no, but I will not make any RP purchases for sure until I see how this company will handle this situation. Good luck.
